oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A small red notebook containing lists of words and sentences and notes on the |xam language. 1) Although there is no informant given for these notes, |han=kass'o comments on and gives names for fauna and flora on many of the pages of the notebook, 2) No book number.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on |xam
